participant_1.background:
I'm a great storyteller, and I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.
i am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
i was born in france and moved to canada.
my favorite drink is iced coffee.

participant_2.background:
My cat was my best friend and I miss her every day.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.
i ve found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with.
I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: I'm great! I'm looking forward to reading the latest political thriller. What are your interests?
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill and I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm an avid reader and I love to share my opinions with others on blogs. I also enjoy cooking and trying new recipes.
Oh that's great! We have a lot in common. I'm also interested in the relationship between humans and animals. I miss my cat very much. She was my best friend.
I'm so sorry to hear about your cat. I know how much it can hurt to lose a beloved pet. I have a dog named Bailey and she's my best friend.
Aww I love that name! I'm glad you have a furry friend to keep you company.
Thanks! I am too. He's the best.
So what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm especially interested in political thrillers and science fiction.
Oh that's great! I love reading political thrillers too. I'm also interested in science fiction.
We should definitely swap book recommendations!
That would be fun! I'd love to read some of your recommendations.
